channel.title: fun on José Villegas
channel.description: Recent content in fun on José Villegas

item.title: Global Game Jam 2018 - Emission
item.description: This game is more competitive we were a bit inspired by the Tron franchise visual style. I was already in Chile when making this game so I worked remotely with my friends in Caracas, Venezuela to complete this game. This game was really fun to play.

item.title: Ollama - A Game In Just A Week
item.description: For this instance I was asked to create a game, alone, in a single week as part of a test. I ended up making an isometric platform game, you have to complete levels and collect coins along the way.

item.title: Global Game Jam 2017 - Echo Switch
item.description: This time we really wanted to do a co-op game. We built the idea around a platform game where you play with your friend, you both co-perate together to advance in the map and defeat enemies.

item.title: Global Game Jam 2016 - Kidz Solution
item.description: For this game jam we went with a more spooky game. And we wanted to make it multi-player. So we came up with the idea to make a tag game but with some modifications to fit the theme and make it more fun.
